title: Deploy Custom Integration to Production
description: A custom integration has passed UAT and is ready to be deployed to the customer's production environment.

tasks.description: Schedule a deployment window with the customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Consultant and customer agree on a time for the deployment.

tasks.description: Deploy the integration script/application to the production environment.
Monitor the integration for a period after deployment to ensure it is running smoothly and without errors.
tasks.expected_outcome: Consultant confirms the integration is stable in production.
